Clerical and admin professionals are usually the voice on the other side when you call the school, or the smile you see when you walk into our offices. During this pandemic they may be the voice that calls to check on your students well-being and answer any questions you might have emailed to the school. Clerical staff and administrative professionals perform several tasks from school newsletters, and calendars to student enrollment and preparing documents for next year. WE applaud you! Thank you for supporting all students, parents and our community. #MVUSDFamily
